text: we were working with a large company
that everybody would know about i'm not
going to name them here
but we were doing a deal and we had gone

say but as i described earlier we're
we're feeling like our posture is really
good there we're going through it all
we're describing how like good our
security is and then they finally were
like hey we need to know that work chart
like who's in charge of security
and uh it was a two-person org chart
it was just scott me
and they looked at it and it
and they just
hey the are you serious like did you
come is this did you forget to fill this

doing everything and the whole deal fell
apart
and uh that was the reason why it wasn't
that they didn't believe us they just uh
i think even from that standpoint um
it uh was evident that we weren't
scaling ourselves and that there there
are natural
consequences of that like whether or not

you know in my case
i can't do all the design turns out uh
it turns out that i need a lot of help
with that and or or that uh you know
scott being the only person who can fix

burden
